entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Eskasoni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 1:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon then changing to freezing rain later this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets late this evening then to snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
